title: Zombie Ferry Station
overview: The content of "The Living Corpse Ferry" revolves around the escape of Cong's (Huynh Dong) group from the outbreak of the epidemic and trying to reach the last ferry in the lower Mekong River region. However, in the process of escaping, they were once lost when Diem's (Oc Thanh Van) degeneration and disruption appeared, causing the group to be forced to separate. And the Zombie attack lands on the island, facing life and death, the characters realize that it is not the disease, it is the existence of selfishness and resentment that pushes them into life-or-death challenges.
